text: Lisa Valerie Kudrow (born July 30, 1963 in Encino, California) is an American actress. She was best known for her roles as Ursula on Mad About You and Phoebe on Friends. Friends has been very popular lately and is still selling many copies, beating many popular shows even though it finished a long time ago. She also starred in P.S. I Love You playing the role Denise Hennessey. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:Screen Actors Guild Award winners Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:Webby Award winners
title: Lisa Kudrow
